specialBuffDetails.name: Charge
specialBuffDetails.description: Increases Damage of the next attack by 3%

skillDetailsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: If a single hit deals more than 25% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), gain 8 Charge stacks. (Once per attack)
Aura: As long as a monster in your party has 4 or more Buffs at the beginning of a turn, it gains 3 Charge stacks.
When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.
Aura: All Charge stacks in the party are 33% stronger.
This Monster starts combat with 7 Charge stacks.
When applying a Buff, there is a chance to also apply 2 Charge stacks, equal to this Monster's Critical Chance.
Each Critical Hit grants this Monster a Charge stack.
Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, it gains a Shield equal to 5% of its Maximum Health and 1 Charge stack.
Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Burn damage, each Monster in your party gains a Charge stack.
Aura: Every Goblin gains 2 Charge stacks at the end of their turn for every Goblin in the party.
All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
Aura: All Insect Monsters in your party start combat with 8 Charge stacks.
Whenever this Monster knocks an enemy out, it gains 3 Charge stacks and it regains half of the Charge stacks it used up during the attack.
Shield actions apply 1 Charge stack per shield. Passive shields have a 20% chance to apply 1 Charge stack.
For every 40 Mana regenerated, gain a Charge stack.
Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.
Aura: For every 60 Mana regenerated by this Monster, apply a Charge stack to the whole party.
Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, it gains 6 Charge stacks.
When this monster is revived or revives another monster, it additionally heals 30% of its Max Health and gains 7 Charge stacks.
Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.
Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party triggers Shock damage, it gets 2 Charge stacks.
Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.
Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.
